item.description: Join us for out Spring Fling Meet-up group! All friendly dogs are welcome to come and play. We have a large indoor playroom where dogs can socialize and romp. If you and your dog have spring fever... then get out of the house and be active! Toys, water, and clean-up are provided. Refreshment for pooches and people. Please make sure your pet is up to date with current vaccines because they will be playing with other dogs. You may call the center for any questions regarding the group session: 860-721-8080.

group.name: The Rocky Hill "All Breed" Meetup Group

item.name: Spring Fling Meet-up!
